title: Legends of the Lovely Hike * | Cleveland Metroparks
text: Our summer landscape is dressed in splendid color in the month of July, specifically in the tallgrass prairie, roadsides, and along the edges of woods. Naturalist Foster Brown will lead you through the Brecksville Reservation prairie to acquaint you with these lovely summer flowers and share their legends, influences, and attractions through time. No registration required. * Also see event listing on Cleveland Metroparks Facebook. Cleveland Metroparks staff can adapt many programs to be accessible to anyone who would like to participate assuming they meet the essential eligibility criteria. Reasonable accommodation can also be made. Please make a request at the time of registration but no later than 72 business hours prior to the program. Contact us at 440.526.1012 or [email protected] or at these telephone numbers. There’s a good chance it’s a beautiful sunny July day at CanalWay Center, outside and in! This... View More Dash into our nature center this month to play our I-spy game. Can you find all 5 hidden... Let’s enjoy the prairie during the heat of the summer.
